title: Mitosis compared Meiosis I with 5 answer options

content.question: Which of the following occurs during mitosis but not during meiosis I ?

choices.label: The chromosomes are pulled to opposite poles of the spindle apparatus.
The chromatids of each chromosome are separated.
Both synapsis and crossing-over take place.
The diploid number of chromosomes is reduced to the haploid number.

content.answer: The chromatids of each chromosome are separated.
